metadata.name: Early For Emma
metadata.description:
Chapter 1 of my journey into web 3 began with three small batch editions of Music NFTs. If you're a holder of this NFT it most likely means you joined me during that time, so welcome aboard. This is a collectors item and represents a moment in my personal web 3 history. 

The medley you hear starts with 'Meet Me On The Lake' - my first ever Music NFT, 10 editions and a national radio debut on BBC Radio Scotland. Next comes 'Low Light' a small, peaceful song from 2020 which found its way into many hearts on Twitter space performances and was subsequently dropped as 20 editions. Finally, this trilogy of tracks is completed by 'In The Smoke', my genesis drop on SoundXYZ.

The NFT includes the date of my live stream on The 402, where it was first available to collect.
